name: Prettypullrequests
tagline: A chrome extension to make reviewing pull requests in Github a little easier.
body:
# Pretty Pull Requests

This extension will add various features to the diff view on Github's pull request pages.

Supports both files changed and commit diffs.

Current Features:
- Click on the file name to collapse a file
- Collapse/Expand all
- Collapse/Expand all that match a criteria
- Collapse/Expand added/removed lines
- Move the close pull request button slightly away from the comment button

Collapse Diffs:
![Collapsed Diffs](http://www.flickr.com/photos/95529021@N07/8715118495/)

Collapse/Expand all, or any path containing a word:
![Collapse All](http://www.flickr.com/photos/95529021@N07/8716234498/)

Collapse/Expand Additions/Deletions:
![Normal](http://www.flickr.com/photos/95529021@N07/8715115615/)![Collapsed](http://www.flickr.com/photos/95529021@N07/8716234474/)

Moved close pull request button away and gave it a better name:
![Close Button](farm8.staticflickr.com/7310/8716234428_653fbdd20b.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
